data.title: All About SWV Quiz
data.meta_description: How much do you know about the all female group SWV? Take my quiz to find out. Enjoy and have fun! - test your knowledge in this quiz! (Author jk18)
data.text:
Quiz Answer Key and Fun Facts

1. What does 'SWV' stand for?

Answer: Sisters with Voices

'SWV' stands for 'Sisters with Voices'. The group was created in the early 1990's in New York City, NY, U.S.A.

2. How many members are in the group SWV?

Answer: Three

The group consists of three members. They are: Cheryl "Coko" Gamble-Clemons, Tamara "Taj" Johnson-George and Leanne "Lelee" Lyons.

3. What is the name of SWV's first album?

Answer: It's About Time

"It's About Time" was released in America in October 1992. The album included the songs: "Anything" and "Coming Home".

4. In what year did SWV go on their "SWV World Tour"?

Answer: 1996

SWV started their "SWV World Tour" in May and ended it in August of 1996. They performed on multiple continents, including North America and Europe. The tour featured the songs from their first and second albums.

5. Did SWV win any "Kids Choice Awards" in 1993?

Answer: Yes

The year 1993 was SWV's chance to shine when they had an astonishing number of wins in multiple categories. All were chosen by their young fans. To view which categories they won in please visit: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SWV

6. Which song was not sung by the group SWV?

Answer: Ain't 2 Proud 2 Beg

The wrong song choice was "Ain't 2 Proud 2 Beg". It was sung by the three woman group TLC which included: Tionne "T-Boz" Watkins, Lisa "Left-Eye" Lopes and Rozonda "Chilli" Thomas. On April 25, 2002, Lisa Lopes sadly passed away.

7. Cheryl "Coko" Gamble-Clemons participated on "Survivor: Tocantins"?

Answer: False

Tamara "Taj" Johnson-George was one of the sixteen lucky contestants chosen to participate on "Survivor Tocantins". She made it to the final four, but was blindsided by her former Jalapao tribe members J.T. and Steven.

8. Which of these acts were featured in a SWV song?

Answer: Lil' Kim

Lil' Kim (born Kimberly Denise Jones) was born in Brooklyn, New York, and is best known for her appearance in the song "Lady Marmalade" and participation in "Dancing with the Stars (U.S)" in 2009 where she placed 5th overall. Lil' Kim's vocals were featured on the song "Give It Up".

9. Who produced the song "Weak"?

Answer: Brian Alexander Morgan

Brian Alexander Morgan is an internationally known producer of an assortment of singers, bands and groups in addition to writing music himself. Paul McCartney is an English musician from the world famous band "The Beatles". Paul McCartney produced the song "Holly Days" for Denny Laine. Chantal Kreviazuk is a Canadian born singer/co-writer, who co-wrote the song "Rich Girl" for Gwen Stefani off her "Love. Angel. Music. Baby" album. Belinda Carlisle is an American born singer from the group "The Go-Go's".

10. Which SWV song contains these lyrics: "Pray for, pray for intermission For me and you, you'll start to kissin' You'll see, what you've been missin'"?

Answer: Release Some Tension

The right song choice for these lyrics was "Release Some Tension". The song is featured on the 'Release Some Tension" album.

11. What was the name of Cheryl "Coko" Gamble-Clemons' debut solo album?

Answer: Hot Coko

Cheryl "Coko" Gamble-Clemons' solo career began with the highly anticipated solo album "Hot Coko". Her first single from the album was "Sunshine".

12. Which SWV song contains these lyrics: "That they would want it for themselves Anyone can see You are so fine, (so fine, so fine)"?

Answer: I'm So Into You

The right song choice for these lyrics was "I'm So Into You". It was released of their debut album "It's About Time".

13. SWV never released a Christmas album release?

Answer: False

Just in time for the holiday season of 1997, SWV released a Christmas album entitled "A Special Christmas". It features some of the most popular and recognized songs of all time, including: "Silent Night", "White Christmas" and "Silver Bells". When the holiday season approaches, pick up SWV's "A Special Christmas" album.

14. Which SWV song contains these lyrics: "This can be an undercover romance 'Cause I feel like I'm the type of girl You could give a chance"?

Answer: You're The One

The correct song choice for these lyrics is "You're The One". The song is featured on their "The Beginning" album. There are many remixes of the song.

15. The following song lyrics are from which song? "Full as a dam at capacity My passion's about to explode, yeah I can't escape, it's surrounding me"

Answer: Rain

These lyrics are from the song "Rain". The song was also featured on SWV's third album "Release Some Tension."

Thank you for playing.

Source: Author jk18

This quiz was reviewed by FunTrivia editor ralzzz before going online.

Any errors found in FunTrivia content are routinely corrected through our feedback system.
